reviewText: great service, great product, thank you!

Thie is a great concert dvd by U2 filmed in Boston, during 2001.  It contains 20 songs, many from their most recent album at the time. Songs such as: "Elavation", "Stuck in a Moment, You Can't Get out Of", "Kite", "In a Little While", and "Walk on". This is a great concert dvd, and I gladly recommend it. Thanks, and may God Bless!!!
